message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds immense value, and I'm confident it can significantly benefit you. I'm initially offering it at a price of $2,200,000. Let me know what you think.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a great product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and willingness to negotiate. While your offer is enticing, the value of this product for me is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000. I believe this reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,500,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
